actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to sell five obsolete vessels to the Inter-Ocean Management Company, a California corporation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to sell, subject to such conditions deemed appropriate in the national interest, five named obsolete vessels to a named corporation. Sets certain limitations on the use of such vessels.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to sell five obsolete vessels to the Inter-Ocean Management Company, a California corporation, and for other purposes.
